data.name: Midnight Ghost Hunt Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official Midnight Ghost Hunt soundtrack written and performed by Ghostwood Empire exclusively for the game. Please note that the soundtrack is still a work in progress and songs will be added when they are completed as the game itself is in early access:

  • Where Are You? (E3 2019 Trailer Edit)
  • Where Are You? (2022 Cinematic Trailer Edit)
  • The Dark (2022 Video Edit)
  • COMING SOON: Where Are You? (Extended Version)
  • COMING SOON: The Dark (Extended Version)
  • Epicenter
  • COMING SOON: This Is The End
  • COMING SOON: scarythingsinthedark.jpeg
  • Forgotten Waltz
  • COMING SOON: Guidelines
  • ...and more fantastic songs to come

data.short_description: This is the official soundtrack for Midnight Ghost Hunt. In the spirit of Early Access it is still a work in progress, and songs will be added when they are completed and sound great.
